      • getMessageNameAndID

        protected static java.lang.String[] getMessageNameAndID(java.lang.String nameID)
        Separate the message name and ID in the supplied string
        Parameters:
        nameID - message name and ID in the format <name> <ID>. A null, blank input, or an input containing only the name or ID is accepted
        Returns:
        Array containing the message name and ID. The name, ID,or both the name and ID can be blank

      • getMessageName

        protected static java.lang.String getMessageName(java.lang.String nameID)
        Get the message name from the message name and ID in the supplied string
        Parameters:
        nameID - message name and ID in the format <name> <ID>. A blank input, or an input containing only the ID is accepted
        Returns:
        Message name from the supplied message name and ID (may be blank)

      • getMessageID

        protected static java.lang.String getMessageID(java.lang.String nameID)
        Get the message ID from the message name and ID in the supplied string
        Parameters:
        nameID - message name and ID in the format <name> <ID>. A blank input, or an input containing only the ID is accepted
        Returns:
        Message ID from the supplied message name and ID (may be blank)

      • getMessageIDsInUse

        protected java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getMessageIDsInUse(boolean includeStructures,
                                                               boolean includeCommands,
                                                               boolean includeOthers,
                                                               boolean includeGroups,
                                                               boolean useTlmMsgIDsFromDb,
                                                               boolean isOverwriteTlmMsgIDs,
                                                               CcddTelemetrySchedulerDialog tlmSchedulerDlg,
                                                               boolean isGetDuplicates,
                                                               java.awt.Component parent)
        Create the list of message IDs that are reserved or are already in use
        Parameters:
        includeStructures - true to include message IDs assigned to tables that represent structures
        includeCommands - true to include message IDs assigned to tables that represent commands
        includeOthers - true to include message IDs assigned to tables that do not represent structures or commands
        includeGroups - true to include message IDs assigned to groups
        useTlmMsgIDsFromDb - true to include message IDs assigned to telemetry messages stored in the project database; false to use the IDs from the currently open telemetry scheduler
        isOverwriteTlmMsgIDs - true to allow overwriting the telemetry message IDs for the currently selected data stream in the open telemetry scheduler; false to not allow overwriting. This value is only used if useTlmMsgIDsFromDb is false
        tlmSchedulerDlg - Reference to the currently open telemetry scheduler. This value is only used if useTlmMsgIDsFromDb is false, in which case it can be set to null
        isGetDuplicates - true to create a list of duplicate IDs. The flags for including tables and for using the telemetry message IDs from the database should be set to true when getting the list of duplicates
        parent - GUI component over which to center any error dialog
        Returns:
        List of message IDs that are reserved or are already in use

      • removeProtectionFlag

        protected static java.lang.String removeProtectionFlag(java.lang.String msgID)
        Get the message ID, minus the auto-assign protection flag (if present), from the supplied message ID
        Parameters:
        msgID - message ID
        Returns:
        Message ID, minus the auto-assign protection flag (if present)

      • getMessageOwnersNamesAndIDs

        protected java.util.List<java.lang.String[]> getMessageOwnersNamesAndIDs(CcddConstants.MessageIDSortOrder sortOrder,
                                                                         boolean hideProtectionFlag,
                                                                         java.awt.Component parent)
        Get the list containing every message owner, name, and ID from every table cell, data field (table or group), and telemetry message. Message names and IDs are determined by the input type assigned to the table column or data field
        Parameters:
        sortOrder - order in which to sort the message ID list: BY_OWNER or BY_NAME (MessageIDSortOrder)
        hideProtectionFlag - true to not display the flag character that protects a message ID from being changed by the auto-update methods; false to allow the flag to remain
        parent - GUI component over which to center any error dialog
        Returns:
        List containing every message name and its corresponding message ID, and the owning entity

      • updateUsageAndDuplicates

        private void updateUsageAndDuplicates(java.lang.String ownerType,
                                      java.lang.String[] ownerAndID,
                                      boolean isGetDuplicates)
        Update the list of message IDs in use and, based on the input flag, update the duplicate IDs list
        Parameters:
        ownerType - message ID owner type (Table or Message)
        ownerAndID - array where the first member is the owner (table name or telemetry message name) and the second element is the message ID
        isGetDuplicates - true to create a list of duplicate IDs
